about_the_game:
The Future Electric RPG Collection music pack features 25 tracks that support its future electric name! This music pack builds the right tone for those seeking to create a world with a futuristic and electric edge. Featuring high energy tunes for bosses and battles, along with electric melodies that support all types of scenarios - from city and dungeon exploring to situations where emotions run wild, this music pack hits the right spot for those seeking a familiar tone with a razor-edged futuristic flare for their next RPG.

Features:

* 25 BGM tracks
* 10 BGS and 20 ME
* All files come in OGG and M4A formats

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
